languages.text:
"Палач, к нему утратив интерес,
Отбросил прочь постылую игрушку
И как подачку малым и голодным
На растерзанье челяди отдал,
Чтоб за объедки билась чернь, его
За щедрость и заботу прославляя".

"The Executioner lost interest,
And blithely tossed the toy despised aside.
Proclaiming it a gift to empty bellies,
He let the rabble tear it into scraps,
And tooth and claw they fought to claim a share,
With every one extolling his largesse."
languages.original_text:
"Палач, к нему утратив интерес,
Отбросил прочь постылую игрушку
И как подачку малым и голодным
На растерзанье челяди отдал,
Чтоб за объедки билась чернь, его
За щедрость и заботу прославляя".

languages.text:
“刽子手已经玩腻了他的玩具，
他将它弃置一旁，不以为意。
他宣称，这是给那些空腹之人的礼物，
让那些乌合之众把它撕碎，以此果腹。
他们张牙舞爪，渴望分一杯羹，
所有人都在赞颂他的慷慨之名。”
languages.original_text:
"The Executioner lost interest,
And blithely tossed the toy despised aside.
Proclaiming it a gift to empty bellies,
He let the rabble tear it into scraps,
And tooth and claw they fought to claim a share,
With every one extolling his largesse."

languages.text:
«El Ejecutor perdió todo interés
y descartó su juguete odioso sin dilación.
Lo llamó regalo para los muertos de sed,
dejó que la turba lo destrozara con emoción
para obtener siquiera un pedazo con brutalidad,
y así todos ellos alabaran su generosidad».
languages.original_text:
"The Executioner lost interest,
And blithely tossed the toy despised aside.
Proclaiming it a gift to empty bellies,
He let the rabble tear it into scraps,
And tooth and claw they fought to claim a share,
With every one extolling his largesse."

y así todos ellos alabaran su generosidad».

languages.text:
「処刑人は興味を失い
憎々しい玩具を平気で投げ捨てた
空腹への贈り物だと言いながら
暴徒どもに身体を切り刻ませた
誰もが歯と爪で分け前を奪いあい
彼の気前の良さを称賛した」
languages.original_text:
"The Executioner lost interest,
And blithely tossed the toy despised aside.
Proclaiming it a gift to empty bellies,
He let the rabble tear it into scraps,
And tooth and claw they fought to claim a share,
With every one extolling his largesse."

彼の気前の良さを称賛した」

languages.text:
"Der Henker verlor das Interesse,
und warf das Spielzeug angewidert fort.
Schenkte es so den hungrigen Mägen,
und der Pöbel, der riss es in Stücke
und erbittert sich um die Fetzen stritt,
all die Weil seinen Großmut noch lobend."
languages.original_text:
"The Executioner lost interest,
And blithely tossed the toy despised aside.
Proclaiming it a gift to empty bellies,
He let the rabble tear it into scraps,
And tooth and claw they fought to claim a share,
With every one extolling his largesse."

languages.text:
« Le Bourreau s'est désintéressé
Et a abandonné son jouet avec mépris.
Prétendant faire une offrande aux ventres affamés,
Il a laissé la foule en faire de la charpie,
Et bec et ongles, elle se l'est arraché,
S'extasiant l'un après l'autre de sa bonhomie. »
languages.original_text:
"The Executioner lost interest,
And blithely tossed the toy despised aside.
Proclaiming it a gift to empty bellies,
He let the rabble tear it into scraps,
And tooth and claw they fought to claim a share,
With every one extolling his largesse."

languages.text:
"Cellat kaybetti hevesini,
Bir kenara attı oyuncaklardan istemediğini,
Karnı boş olan gelsin doyursun dedi.
Geldi paryalar, ettiler lime lime,
Fırsat bulan etini doldurdu cebine,
İşlediği hayır için Celladı öve öve."
languages.original_text:
"The Executioner lost interest,
And blithely tossed the toy despised aside.
Proclaiming it a gift to empty bellies,
He let the rabble tear it into scraps,
And tooth and claw they fought to claim a share,
With every one extolling his largesse."
